scenario: The USS Enterprise encounters a derelict Ferengi vessel drifting near the Bajoran border. Power readings are erratic, and the ship appears abandoned.
dialogue: Data: Sensors indicate minimal power output. Life signs are inconsistent—possibly automated systems malfunctioning.
Worf: This could be a trap. Ferengi rarely abandon profit.
Riker: Orders, Captain?

options.label: Send an away team to investigate.

dialogue: La Forge: Environmental controls are unstable but survivable.
Worf: The Ferengi computer core has been wiped clean. Deliberately.

options.label: Recover what logs remain.

dialogue: Data: Fragmented entries reference a Cardassian vessel before contact ceased.
outcome.debrief: Starfleet Command commends your decisive response. Evidence of Cardassian interference will be reviewed by Diplomatic Corps analysts.

options.label: Destroy the vessel to prevent intelligence theft.

dialogue: Worf: Photon torpedoes locked.
Riker: A clean shot, sir.
outcome.debrief: Starfleet notes your caution but expresses concern over the destruction of potential evidence. Command expects a full tactical justification.

options.label: Tow the vessel to the nearest Federation starbase.

dialogue: La Forge: Tractor beam engaged. Hull integrity dropping rapidly.
Troi: I sense... deception. Something aboard doesn’t want to be moved.

options.label: Release immediately.

dialogue: The Ferengi ship destabilizes and explodes moments later.
outcome.debrief: Your quick thinking prevented possible sabotage. Starfleet Engineering will review tractor protocols for unknown derelicts.

options.label: Maintain tractor beam and raise shields.

dialogue: Worf: Multiple detonations across the hull. Shields holding.
outcome.debrief: Starfleet praises your composure under pressure. The incident underscores the dangers of towing unstable alien craft.

options.label: Ignore and continue on course.

dialogue: Troi: That doesn’t feel right, Captain.
Picard’s voice echoes in your mind from training: 'There is a difference between prudence and neglect.'
outcome.debrief: Starfleet Command notes your inaction. Future evaluations will assess judgment under uncertain circumstances.

outcome.debrief: Your quick thinking prevented possible sabotage. Starfleet Engineering will review tractor protocols for unknown derelicts.

options.label: Maintain tractor beam and raise shields.

dialogue: Worf: Multiple detonations across the hull. Shields holding.
outcome.debrief: Starfleet praises your composure under pressure. The incident underscores the dangers of towing unstable alien craft.

options.label: Ignore and continue on course.

dialogue: Troi: That doesn’t feel right, Captain.
Picard’s voice echoes in your mind from training: 'There is a difference between prudence and neglect.'
outcome.debrief: Starfleet Command notes your inaction. Future evaluations will assess judgment under uncertain circumstances.

scenario: Unique scenario #17: Randomized deep-space situation involving the Enterprise and nearby alien phenomena.
dialogue: Data: Sensors indicate minimal power output. Life signs are inconsistent—possibly automated systems malfunctioning.
Worf: This could be a trap. Ferengi rarely abandon profit.
Riker: Orders, Captain?

options.label: Send an away team to investigate.

dialogue: La Forge: Environmental controls are unstable but survivable.
Worf: The Ferengi computer core has been wiped clean. Deliberately.

options.label: Recover what logs remain.

dialogue: Data: Fragmented entries reference a Cardassian vessel before contact ceased.
outcome.debrief: Starfleet Command commends your decisive response. Evidence of Cardassian interference will be reviewed by Diplomatic Corps analysts.

options.label: Destroy the vessel to prevent intelligence theft.

dialogue: Worf: Photon torpedoes locked.
Riker: A clean shot, sir.
outcome.debrief: Starfleet notes your caution but expresses concern over the destruction of potential evidence. Command expects a full tactical justification.

options.label: Tow the vessel to the nearest Federation starbase.

dialogue: La Forge: Tractor beam engaged. Hull integrity dropping rapidly.
Troi: I sense... deception. Something aboard doesn’t want to be moved.

options.label: Release immediately.

dialogue: The Ferengi ship destabilizes and explodes moments later.
